name: Map Portfolio
description: Please scroll through these boxes or click a point on the map to learn more about my projects.
title: Welcome to My Map Portfolio!

name: Nehalem Basin
description: Efforts to protect and restore Coho Salmon habitat in the Coast Range.
title: Protecting Coho Salmon in the Nehalem Watershed

name: Tallahassee
description: Designing straight-forward apps for the collection of public input.
title: Application Development for Public Input

name: Lake Oswego
description: A look at Oregon white oaks, a keystone species, in the area.
title: Oregon White Oaks in Lake Oswego

name: Map Music
description: A simple app to turn geospatial data into (questionably) beautiful sounds.
title: Turning Maps into Music

name: PCC Rock Creek
description: A drone mapping workflow from start to finish.
title: Drone Mapping of PCC Rock Creek Learning Garden

name: Northern Oregon Coast
description: Looking for ways to quantify and reduce wildlife injuries in the Norther Oregon coast.
title: Wildlife Injuries in the North Coast

name: Monterey Bay
description: Spatial analysis to determine potential dive sites in the Monterey Bay area in central California.
title: Potential Dive Sites in the Monterey Bay Area

name: Chiricahua Mountains
description: A map showcasing the fascinating biodiversity of the Chiricahua Mountains in Arizona.
title: Fauntastic Chiricahua Mountains

name: Taiwan
description: An analysis of changing temperatures in Taiwan and the role of environmental factors in this change. Presented at GIS in Action 2022.
title: Slowing Down the Inevitable

name: Europe
description: A map utilizing data obtained in my work as an Intelligence Analyst. A summary of major security incidents over the first 5 months of 2023.
title: European Security Alert Summary

name: Global
description: Infographic exploring the Wellcome Global Monitor's poll data on trust in science and medical institutions.
title: Global Trust in Health Infographic
